title: NBO TX SOS Entity Harvester Input

harvestMode.title: Harvest mode
harvestMode.description: oneDay = pull for a specific targetDate. all60Days = pull the full 60-day window (no date filtering).

targetDate.title: Target date (YYYY-MM-DD)
targetDate.description: Used only when harvestMode=oneDay. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of paginated result pages to harvest.

paymentClientAccountValue.title: Payment client account value
paymentClientAccountValue.description: If SOSDirect prompts you to choose a client/payment account, this value will be selected (example: "5").

navTimeoutMs.title: Navigation timeout (ms)
navTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for navigations / full page loads in milliseconds.

selectorTimeoutMs.title: Selector timeout (ms)
selectorTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for waiting on selectors / elements in milliseconds.

debugHtml.title: Debug HTML
debugHtml.description: Write key HTML snapshots to the key-value store.

debugScreenshots.title: Debug screenshots
debugScreenshots.description: Write key screenshots to the key-value store.

searchWildcard.title: Search wildcard
searchWildcard.description: Value to place in the RA activity search box (often "*" or "**").
